WELCOME TO DR. GUZMAN EYECARE

Guzman Eye Care is a complete eye care facility specializing in comprehensive eye exams, ocular emergencies, cataract and laser surgery evaluations,contact lenses and dress and safety eyewear.

First slide label

Some representative placeholder content for the first slide.

Second slide label

Some representative placeholder content for the second slide.

Dr. Guzman is a graduate of Pacific University and
opened his private practice in Elko in March of 1997.
Dr. Guzman was born and raised in Elko and is pleased
to be back here with his wife Georgia, their son Aiden
and daughter Olivia. Dr. Guzman is a member of The
American Optometric Association, The Nevada
Optometric Association and is involved in Sight for
Students, VSP.
